ISSUE.TITLE: Timeformat setting does not work
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I tried setting TIME_FORMAT in Azure's App Settings to 24, but the website still defaults to 12 hour presentation. Quick check revealed that lib\client\index.js (rows 103 and 111) check the setting as a number, when it is in fact present in client.settings as a string. README.md, tests\fixtures\default-server-settings.js, \lib\report_plugins\daytoday.js, static\profile\js\profileeditor.js all seem to treat the value as a string. static\js\client.js is agnostic and uses == instead of ===
